SEARCH
Package librarySE.strategy

Class FineStrategyFactory

java.lang.Object
librarySE.strategy.FineStrategyFactory
public final class FineStrategyFactory extends Object
Central factory for creating FineStrategy instances for all supported library material types (Book, CD, Journal).

The factory hides all details about:

  • Which configuration keys are used
  • What business defaults are applied if keys are missing
  • How fine-per-day and borrow-period are combined into one strategy

Business rules (defaults)

These defaults are taken from the assignment user stories:
  • Book:
    • Borrow period = 28 days
    • Overdue fine = 10 NIS / day
  • CD:
    • Borrow period = 7 days
    • Overdue fine = 20 NIS / day
  • Journal:
    • Borrow period = 21 days
    • Overdue fine = 15 NIS / day

Configuration integration

All values are read from the central Config class, which loads data/config/fine-config.properties. The following keys are used (with the defaults above):

  • fine.book.rate, fine.book.period
  • fine.cd.rate, fine.cd.period
  • fine.journal.rate, fine.journal.period

If a key is missing or invalid in the properties file, the factory automatically falls back to the documented default value so that the system remains robust.

Typical usage


 // Book: 28 days, 10 NIS per overdue day
 FineStrategy bookStrategy = FineStrategyFactory.book();

 // CD: 7 days, 20 NIS per overdue day
 FineStrategy cdStrategy   = FineStrategyFactory.cd();

 // Journal: 21 days, 15 NIS per overdue day
 FineStrategy journalStrategy = FineStrategyFactory.journal();
Author:
Malak

  • Method Details

    • book

      public static FineStrategy book()
      Creates a FineStrategy configured for books.

      Configuration keys:

      • fine.book.rate – fine per overdue day (default: 10.0)
      • fine.book.period – allowed borrow period in days (default: 28)
      Returns:
      a FineStrategy whose rate and period match the business rules for books

    • cd

      public static FineStrategy cd()
      Creates a FineStrategy configured for CDs.

      Configuration keys:

      • fine.cd.rate – fine per overdue day (default: 20.0)
      • fine.cd.period – allowed borrow period in days (default: 7)
      Returns:
      a FineStrategy whose rate and period match the business rules for CDs

    • journal

      public static FineStrategy journal()
      Creates a FineStrategy configured for journals.

      Configuration keys:

      • fine.journal.rate – fine per overdue day (default: 15.0)
      • fine.journal.period – allowed borrow period in days (default: 21)
      Returns:
      a FineStrategy whose rate and period match the business rules for journals
